sentences.en: "In order to prevent this oxidation of cholesterol, we need to consume antioxidants, preferably natural antioxidants that you get from fruits and vegetables, " he said in an interview.
sentences.cn: “为了防止这种胆固醇氧化，我们需要消耗抗氧化剂，最好是从水果和蔬菜得到的天然抗氧化剂， ”他在接受采访时说道。

sentences.en: Cholesterol level is not a strong predictor of heart disease in women.
sentences.cn: 胆固醇含量不能有效地预示妇女心脏病。

sentences.en: I reasoned that changing my diet would lower my cholesterol level.
sentences.cn: 我推断改变自己的饮食可以降低我的胆固醇水平。

sentences.en: If it does, you should discuss with your physician other approaches to cholesterol control.
sentences.cn: 若确实如此，您应该与您的医生讨论其他控制胆固醇方法。

sentences.en: If you don't know your cholesterol level, it's a good idea to have it checked.
sentences.cn: 你要是不清楚自己的胆固醇水平，最好去检查一下。

sentences.en: Many other medications have an influence on cholesterol levels.
sentences.cn: 许多其他的药物治疗对胆固醇水平都有一定的影响。

sentences.en: Many people experienced a drop in their cholesterol levels when they consumed oat bran.
sentences.cn: 很多人食用燕麦麸后胆固醇水平下降了。

sentences.en: Oxidized cholesterol may be responsible for furring up the arteries.
sentences.cn: 氧化胆固醇可能是造成动脉堵塞的元凶。

sentences.en: Scientists have established a connection between cholesterol levels and heart disease.
sentences.cn: 科学家已证实胆固醇含量与心脏病之间有关联。

sentences.en: See just how much fat and cholesterol you're eating.
sentences.cn: 看看你究竟摄入了多少脂肪和胆固醇。

sentences.en: So why would you want to lower your cholesterol?
sentences.cn: 那么为什么你想降低你的胆固醇呢？

sentences.en: The power of red wine to counteract high cholesterol has been ballyhooed in the press.
sentences.cn: 红酒降低胆固醇的功效被媒体夸大了。

sentences.en: There is cholesterol in the cell of body.
They are determining the serum - protein and cholesterol levels.
sentences.cn: 他们正在测定血清蛋白和胆固醇的浓度.

sentences.en: This drug lowers cholesterol levels by binding fats in the intestine.
sentences.cn: 这种药通过黏合肠内的脂肪降低胆固醇水平。

sentences.en: Unlike animal cell membranes, plant membranes do not contain cholesterol.
sentences.cn: 与动物细胞膜不一样, 植物的膜不含胆固醇.

sentences.en: What role did a high cholesterol level play in his heart disease?
sentences.cn: 胆固醇浓度高和他的心脏病发作有什么关系?

trans.tran_en: a chemical substance found in your blood. Too much cholesterol in your body may cause heart disease.
